message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $150 is too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $80 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $110 is still a bit steep for me. How about we settle at $90?
I'm not willing to go below $100, but I can offer you a slight discount. I'll meet you at $95
